document.full_text: a hungarian court on thursday began the trial of sandor kepiro, 97, accused over the massacre of more than a thousand people in the serb city of novi sad during world war two.
document.title: hungarian, 97, on trial for world war two crimes
lines_and_colors: a hungarian court on thursday began the trial of sandor kepiro, 97, accused over the massacre of more than a thousand people in the serb city of novi sad during world war two.
